greetingText: I really like Your name BTW
text1: Wishing you a day filled with love. laughter and everything that make you smile
textInChatBox: 🎉 Happy Birthday, Ayushi! 🎂 Wishing you all the joy and sunshine in the world today and always! You're not just a wonderful friend but also someone who brings good vibes wherever you go. May your year ahead be filled with happiness, success, and everything your heart wishes for. Have the most amazing day — you deserve it! 🥳💫🎈
text2: That's what i was going to do
text4: I realised i want to do somthing
outroText: To a beautiful soul like you, Ayushi — may your smile shine brighter with each passing year.
replayText: I made this so you'll always have a reminder of how breathtakingly beautiful your smile truly is—just one glance, and the whole world feels brighter.
